en-US.global__corp_info_attrs_remark_text: figures listed denote a number of different attributes / structures (i.e. types) in the corpus.
en-US.global__there_are_unsaved_changes: There are unsaved changes on the page. Do you want to continue without saving them?
en-US.global__query_type_mismatch: Possible query type mismatch. Do you want to continue?
en-US.global__what_are_positions: Positions are basic units for searching the corpus that correspond to tokens: every single occurrence of a word form, number or punctuation symbol in the corpus constitutes a position. Corpus size in positions given by the search interface is therefore higher than corpus size in number of words given on the ICNC web pages, where only postions containing at least one alphabetic character are considered.
en-US.global__failed_to_contact_server: Failed to contact server. Please try again later.
en-US.global__anonymous_user_warning: KonText is running in anonymous mode. Please sign-in to unlock all the functions.
en-US.global__this_applies_only_for_mk: This counts only for multi-word KWICs
en-US.global__are_you_sure_to_leave: You have unfinished line selection (no filter applied yet). Leaving the page may cause the selection to be lost.
en-US.global__this_action_resets_current_selec: This action will reset you current unsaved subcorpus
en-US.global__wl_calc_info: Some operations need more preprocessing. It will take a while, please wait. Once the list has been computed, it will be stored, so will be immediately available next time. You can close this window. Repeating wordlist or keywords queries on the same subcorpus will show you progress of the computation
en-US.global__sorting_backwards_explanation: Comparison starts with the last characters of words
en-US.global__size_warning: Due to the large size, the concordance has been truncated to the first {size} lines.
en-US.global__subcorpus_will_be_restored_using: The subcorpus will be created again using the original query.
en-US.global__bg_calculation_failed: Failed to finish the calculation. Please try again later or contact system support.
en-US.global__bg_calculation_waiting_failed: The calculation appears to be progressing slowly. Please wait a few minutes and then reload the page.
en-US.global__ipm_calc_may_take_time: Please note that the calculation may take some time depending on the size of your ad-hoc subcorpus (typically units to tens of seconds).
en-US.global__within_hint_text: Select an appropriate 'within' condition, structure and input an expression specifying required values of structural attributes (e.g. 'author="Doyle.+" & title=".*Sherlock.*"')
en-US.global__there_are_tasks_running_{num_tas: You have {num_tasks, plural, one{is # running task} other{are # running tasks}} on the server.
en-US.global__there_are_tasks_finished_{num_ta: There {num_tasks, plural, one{is # finished task} other{are # finished tasks}}.
en-US.global__remove_finished_tasks_info: Remove finished tasks information after closing the overview
en-US.global__click_and_hold_to_move: Click and hold the button to move the object.
en-US.global__these_task_are_finished: The following tasks have been finished
en-US.global__subc_all_the_tokens: Select all the positions matching the expression
en-US.global__subc_all_the_matching_tokens_{pr: ... From among them, select the ones matching the expression
en-US.global__coll_save_max_lines_warning_{max: Please note that due to performance reasons, KonText saves at most {max_coll_save_size, plural, one{# item} other{# items}}.
en-US.global__sorted_click_change: Sorted by this column. Click to change the order.
en-US.global__click_to_sort: Click to sort by this column.
en-US.global__hit_enter_to_confirm: Hit Enter to confirm the value
en-US.global__no_more_pages: There are no more pages available
en-US.global__the_form_contains_errors_msg: The form cannot be submitted because it contains errors.
en-US.global__failed_to_render_component_expl: This is typically caused by a misconfigured plug-in.
en-US.global__public_subc_id_{id}: The subcorpus is available via a permanent public code {id}
en-US.global__anon_user_opts_save_warn: For anonymous users, saving of view option persist only until the web browser is closed.
en-US.global__click_or_esc_to_close: Click or hit ESC to close the window
en-US.global__quicksave_limit_warning_{format}: One-click saving of data to the {format} format saves at most {lines, plural, one{# line} other{# lines}}. OK?
en-US.linesel__no_ops_after_groups_save_info: Please note that once you save your line groups the concordance will be locked for further filtering/sorting/sampling
en-US.linesel__failed_store_conclines_quota_ex: Failed to store selected concordance lines due to exceeded data limit.
en-US.linesel__view_sorted_groups: View sorted according to the groups
en-US.linesel__send_the_link_to_mail: Send selection URL to an e-mail
en-US.linesel__line_selection_link_heading: A URL of this line selection
en-US.linesel__you_have_no_sel_lines: There are no selected lines to work with
en-US.linesel__you_have_unsaved_line_sel: You have an unsaved line selection. Click the link to select an operation.
en-US.linesel__you_have_saved_line_groups: You have a saved line selection. Click the link to see available operations.
en-US.linesel__error_group_name_please_use{max: Incorrect group ID. Please use integers from 1 to {max_group}.
en-US.linesel__if_empty_lab_then_remove: Renaming to an empty value drops the label
en-US.linesel__if_existing_lab_then_merge: Renaming to an existing value merges source and destination groups
en-US.query__select_one_or_more_pos_tags: Select one or more PoS tags
en-US.query__tt_range_help_text: Ambiguously dated documents may meet the selected time range only partially, e.g. the time range 1800-1850 can be specified to include or exclude a document dated 1795±10 (1785-1805).
en-US.query__tt_multiple_items_same_name_{num_: This item represents {num_items, plural, one{# record} other{# records}} of the same name.
en-US.query__tt_click_to_see_attr_info: Click to see an information about the attribute (opens in a new window)
en-US.query__implicit_attr_cannot_be_changed: The implicit attribute cannot be changed here.
en-US.query__qlfilter_sel_token_hint: Applies in case of multiple matches on a line.
en-US.query__sort_set_spos_error_msg: A number greater than zero must be used
en-US.query__replay_op_cannot_be_edited_msg: This operation has no editable parameters, however the result can be viewed
en-US.query__sample_value_must_be_gt_zero: Number of lines in the sample must be a number greater then zero
en-US.query__create_sample_desc: Make a random sample from the concordance
en-US.query__create_sample_rlines_label: Number of lines in the sample
en-US.query__shuffle_large_data_warn: Please note that shuffling such a large concordance may take a long time or even not finish
en-US.query__the_form_no_params_to_change: The operation has no parameters to edit
en-US.query__operation_is_automatic_and_cannot: This operation has been generated automatically and thus cannot be edited
en-US.query__save_as_box_hint: By saving the query, you make a permanent record in your recent queries.
en-US.query__save_as_box_hint_explicit: By saving the query, you make a permanent record in your recent queries. This record will refer only to the query itself which means any subsequent operations will not be included. If you want to preserve/publish the current concordance state (i.e. including filters, sorting etc.) please use 'Permanent link' function.
en-US.query__save_as_item_saved: The query information has been saved
en-US.query__save_as_item_removed: The item will be ovewritten by incoming queries (the URL address of a respective concordance remains functional).
en-US.query__save_as_cannot_have_empty_name: The query name cannot be empty
en-US.query__type_hint_basic: Search for the input expression as a word form case-insensitively; if it is also a canonical dictionary form (lemma), all its word forms are searched for as well.
en-US.query__type_hint_lemma: Case sensitive search by a canonical dictionary form (lemma); all its word forms will be present in search results. Query supports regular expressions.
en-US.query__type_hint_phrase: Search for a given sequence of word forms; the search is case insensitive by default. Query supports regular expressions.
en-US.query__type_hint_word: Search for an individual word form. Query supports regular expressions.
en-US.query__type_hint_char: Search for a string of characters anywhere within a word. Query supports regular expressions.
en-US.query__type_hint_cql: Search for anything that is present in the annotation of the corpus, e.g. [attribute1="value1" & attribute2="value2"] [attribute3="value3"] within <s/> will search for two successive words with the specified attribute values and appearing within a single sentence; attribute values may be regular expressions.
en-US.query__click_to_edit_tag: Click while holding CTRL to edit the tag using an interactive tool
en-US.query__unrecognized_input_{wrongChar}{po: Syntax error - unexpected character "{wrongChar}" at position {position}.
en-US.query__tip_01: You can use the "down arrow" key to view recent queries
en-US.query__tip_02: In CQL mode you can use Shift+ENTER to enter a new line
en-US.query__tip_03: In case of compatibility problems with advanced CQL editor and your browser, you can switch back to basic CQL editor in "View" → "General view options"
en-US.query__tip_04: You can click a tag value while holding CTRL to edit the tag using an interactive tool
en-US.query__tip_05: In case of aligned corpora, it is faster to search only within texts included in all the searched languages. To find such texts, 'restrict search - refine selection' function can be used.
en-US.concview__ipm_rel_to_adhoc: related to the subset defined by the selected text types
en-US.concview__arf_not_avail: ARF is not available for subcorpora
en-US.concview__click_to_expand_left: Click to expand to the left
en-US.concview__click_to_expand_right: Click to expand to the right
en-US.concview__no_speech_metadata_available: Metadata not available due to partially displayed speech. Try to expand the context.
en-US.concview__segment_has_no_playback_data: This segment does not contain audio playback data.
en-US.concview__save_form_line_from_err_msg_{v: The value must be a number between 1 and {value}
en-US.concview__save_form_line_to_err_msg_{val: The value must be a number between {value1} and {value2}
en-US.concview__click_to_see_the_tree: Click to see the syntax tree
en-US.concview__click_to_hide_the_corpus: Click to hide the result of this corpus
en-US.concview__click_to_show_the_corpus: Click to show the result of this corpus
en-US.concview__using_sample_{value}: Due to a large concordance size, the overview is based on a random sample of size {value, plural, one{# position} other{# positions}}
en-US.concview__displaying_charts_up_to_{num_i: Displaying only charts with at most {num_items, plural, one{# item} other{# items}}
en-US.concview__display_limited_tt_charts: Hide charts with too many items?
en-US.concview__permanent_link_hint_{ttl}: By default, URLs of pages in KonText are valid for {ttl, plural, one{# day} other {# days}}. To be able to refer to this concordance without a time limit (e.g. for published papers), use this function.
en-US.concview__permanent_link_is_archived: This concordance has a permanent link
en-US.concview__make_conc_link_permanent_done: The link to the concordance is now permanent.
en-US.concview__make_conc_link_permanent_revok: The permanent status of the link has been revoked
en-US.concview__tip_01: You can use keyboard shorcuts on this page. Hit <Shift> <k> to view the list.
en-US.concview__tip_02: In case your CQL query produces nested matches (e.g. if you search one or more adjectives preceding a noun) you can use 'Filter -> Remove nested matches'.
en-US.concview__tip_03: Searching via an ad-hoc subcorpus ("restrict search") does not provide i.p.m. information. If you need i.p.m. then create a named subcorpus and use it for the search.
en-US.concview__tip_04: To show/hide this window quickly, use the <e> key
en-US.options__remove_word_warning: Please note that without the 'word' attribute, concordance lines won't look like a common readable text
en-US.options__attr_apply_header: How to display additional positional attributes?
en-US.options__vmode_switch_visible_all: in text for all the tokens
en-US.options__vmode_switch_mixed: in text for KWIC, on mouse-over for others
en-US.options__vmode_switch_indicator_desc: This icon is displayed in the header of the concordance window to indicate viewing mode.
en-US.options__this_applies_for_all_the_corpor: Following settings apply for all the corpora.
en-US.subcform__missing_subcname: A subcorpus name must be specified
en-US.subcform__missing_description: A published subcorpus must have a description
en-US.subcform__at_least_one_type_must_be_sele: At least one text type must be selected
en-US.subcform__publication_notes: If selected then the subcorpus will be given a public identifier (besides its original name) giving access rights to other users. Use this in case you plan to publish/share results based on this subcorpus.
en-US.subcform__publication_notes_2: This property can be set also on an existing private subcorpus but the publication must always be done before you start to share concordance URLs.
en-US.subclist__info_subc_will_be_wiped: The subcorpus back-up is about to be deleted. It will be impossible to restore the subcorpus.
en-US.subclist__info_subc_will_be_restored: The subcorpus will be restored from back-up.
en-US.subclist__subc_restore_confirm_msg: Subcorpus is being restored from back-up
en-US.subclist__subc_reuse_confirm_msg: A new subcorpus is being created
en-US.subclist__reuse_query_warn: Please note that full use of this function requires advanced knowledge of CQL
en-US.subclist__publish_warning: Are you sure you want to make the subcorpus accessible by anyone?
en-US.subclist__ex_post_publish_warning: Please note that only search results performed after the publication is publicly accessible (i.e. links shared before this publication will not work).
en-US.subclist__ex_post_desc_update_warning: Published subcorpus cannot be unpublished, but the description can be modified as long as you keep your copy of the subcorpus. In case you delete the subcorpus the public copy will remain available but you will not be able to modify it in any way.
en-US.subclist__subc_delete_confirm_{subc}: Are you sure to delete subcorpus {subc}?
en-US.pubsubclist__input_prefix_warn_{min_size: mininum {min_size, plural, one{# character} other{# characters}}
en-US.pubsubclist__operator_disclaimer: Public subcorpora are intended mainly for sharing subcorpora among the users and promotion of replicability of research. Public subcorpora thus constitute a part of the KonText query interface which is not endorsed in any way.
en-US.coll__min_coll_freq_in_corpus: Minimum collocate frequency in the corpus
en-US.coll__min_coll_freq_in_span: Minimum collocate frequency in the span
en-US.coll__save_form_leave_to_load_to_end: leave the upper limit empty to save values up to the end
en-US.coll__save_form_from_val_err_msg: The left value must be greater of equal to 1 and smaller than the right value (if defined)
en-US.coll__form_sort_col_must_be_displayed: Cannot remove a score type the result is sorted by.
en-US.coll__form_help_term_m: a score based on so called "mutual information" (a term from information theory)
en-US.coll__form_help_term_3: a score based on so called "mutual information" (a term from information theory)
en-US.coll__form_help_term_t: a score derived from statistical T-test
en-US.freq__neg_filter_disabled: Negative filter cannot be used here.
en-US.freq__save_form_from_value_err_msg: The left value must be greater of equal to 1 and smaller than the right value (if defined).
en-US.freq__ct_only_some_sattr_allowed_{allowe: In case two structural attributes are selected, only the ones from \{{allowed_sattrs}\} are allowed.
en-US.freq__ct_two_sattrs_not_allowed: In case of this corpus, two structural attributes cannot be selected at the same time
en-US.freq__ct_uses_ad_hoc_subcorpus_warn: Please note that calculated relative frequencies (i.p.m.) are based on the whole corpus and not on the current text types selection.
en-US.freq__ct_uses_ad_hoc_subcorpus_future_wa: Please note that calculated relative frequencies (i.p.m.) will be based on the whole corpus and not on the current text types selection. To avoid this, create a named subcorpus.
en-US.freq__ct_min_freq_val_error: Invalid value - use \{0, 1, 2, …\} for abs/ipm and \{1, …,100\} for percentiles.
en-US.freq__ct_pfilter_legend: Instant filter for the current concordance
en-US.freq__ct_sort_col_opt_ipm: sum of i.p.m. in a column
en-US.freq__ct_sort_col_opt_abs: sum of abs. frequencies in a column
en-US.freq__ct_sort_row_opt_ipm: sum of i.p.m. in a row
en-US.freq__ct_sort_row_opt_abs: sum of abs. frequencies in a row
en-US.freq__ct_conf_interval_too_uncertain: The lower bound of the confidence interval is too small.
en-US.freq__ct_confidence_level_hint_paragraph: The confidence interval is calculated using Wilson method. KonText also checks whether the lower bound of the interval is big enough (> {threshold,number}) - if not then a warning is displayed.
en-US.freq__ct_ipm_x_axis_hint_{prob}: The pink circles represent observed values. The blue lines mark the intervals where individual true values should lie with probability {prob}%. The narrower is the interval, the more precise is our knowledge of a specific phenomenon's frequency within a language.
en-US.freq__ct_click_to_compare_col: Click to compare confidence intervals in the column
en-US.freq__ct_click_to_compare_row: Click to compare confidence intervals in the row
en-US.freq__ct_color_mapping_hint: Linear mapping transforms a cell value 'v' to a color 'c' directly using a linear function c = a·v. It is useful when looking for an outlier value (a unique color will be attached to it). Percentile mapping calculates a cell color indirectly using an index 'i' within an ordered list of cell values. It is useful e.g. when looking for cells belonging to the top/bottom x-percent.
en-US.freq__ct_percentile_hint_{value}: The top {value}% of values will be returned
en-US.user__pwd_and_pwd2_do_not_match: New password and its confirmation do not match
en-US.wordlist__multiattr_warning: Please note that selecting more attributes at once causes the calculation to take more time compared with the single attribute variant
en-US.wordlist__wl_white_lists: Wordlist whitelists and blacklists must be plain text (.txt), encoded in UTF-8, with one item per line.  The items must correspond to the selected attribute, so, eg, if 'lemma' is selected from the attribute menu, then the list should be a list of lemmas. We use exact matching, not regular-expression matching, for file input.
en-US.wordlist__confirm_file_remove: Are you sure you want to remove the filter list?
en-US.wordlist__minfreq_err: A number greater that zero must be used
en-US.wordlist__use_ctrl_enter_for_newline: To enter a new line, use Ctrl+ENTER
